split-koch.name: Split Koch
split-koch.description: A fractal based on the Koch curve with splits. Used as the default example.

sierpinski-tetrahedron.name: Sierpinski Tetrahedron
sierpinski-tetrahedron.description: A 3d fractal based on the Sierpinski triangle.

inverse-sierpinski-tetrahedron.name: Inverse Sierpinski Tetrahedron
inverse-sierpinski-tetrahedron.description: An inverse of the Sierpinski Tetrahedron

menger-sponge.name: Menger Sponge
menger-sponge.description: A well-known 3d fractal with a cube-based structure.

l-sponge.name: L Sponge
l-sponge.description: A well-known 3d fractal with a cube-based structure.

jerusalem-cube.name: Jerusalem Cube
jerusalem-cube.description: A fractal similar to the Menger Sponge.

custom-2x2x2.name: Custom 2x2x2
custom-2x2x2.description: A custom 2x2x2 fractal. The pattern is a 3d matrix where each cell is toggle-able.

custom-3x3x3.name: Custom 3x3x3
custom-3x3x3.description: A custom 3x3x3 fractal. The pattern is a 3d matrix where each cell is toggle-able.

custom-4x4x4.name: Custom 4x4x4
custom-4x4x4.description: A custom 4x4x4 fractal. The pattern is a 3d matrix where each cell is toggle-able.

custom-5x5x5.name: Custom 5x5x5
custom-5x5x5.description: A custom 5x5x5 fractal. The pattern is a 3d matrix where each cell is toggle-able.

sierpinski-dodecahedron.name: Sierpinski Dodecahedron
sierpinski-dodecahedron.description: A 3d fractal based on the sierpinski pentagon.
